items.title: Sterling Could Recover if U.K. Government Boosts Economic Prospects
items.description: Sterling could recover against the euro in coming months if the U.K. government works to improve consumer and business confidence, Commerzbank said. S...

items.title: Nasdaq Leads Gains as Netflix Stock Jumps
items.description: The S&P 500, Nasdaq and Dow industrials all notched gains as AI-linked stocks surged.

items.title: Treasury Yields Rise a Little as Tariffs Are Delayed
items.description: Treasury yields edged up, reclaiming some lost ground as markets digest Trump’s relatively mild approach to tariffs at the start of his second term.

items.title: Gold Futures Rise Amid Tariff Threats
items.description: Gold futures rose, with tariff threats set to keep demand high.
